document_title: Systemic lupus erythematosus: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Systemic lupus erythematosus, also known as SLE or lupus, is a long-term, chronic disease that can manifest in any organ in the body. Lupus is sometimes called “the great imitator,” because people often mistake it for other health problems. Most patients feel tired and develop a butterfly-shaped rash, pain, joint swelling and fever. (first)
subsection_title: lupus ban do he thong.json. What is systemic lupus erythematosus?
subsection_data:
lupus ban do he thong.json. What is systemic lupus erythematosus?
Systemic lupus erythematosus, also known as SLE or lupus, is a long-term, chronic disease that can manifest in any organ in the body. Lupus is sometimes called “the great imitator,” because people often mistake it for other health problems. Most patients feel tired and develop a butterfly-shaped rash, pain, joint swelling and fever. (first)
